articles.content: After 17 games last season, ATK Mohun Bagan (ATKMB) had scored 32 goals. That is 12 more than what they have managed in the Indian Super League (ISL) this term. Only the bottom two, NorthEast United … [+5693 chars]

articles.title: Rishabh Pant posts first pictures of himself walking on crutches since frightful car accident - OTV News
articles.description: In the pictures, it is found that Pant’s right knee is taped up as he underwent knee surgery after suffering a ligament tear.
articles.content:
Explosive Indian wicketkeeper-batsman Rishabh Pant on Friday tweeted two pictures of himself walking with the help of crutches on a bright sunny day.
